> The basic attack for an asassin would be throwing a dagger if the 
opponent was a pretty good distance away and for up close it would 
be using a sword to slash opponents.

I'll also add another ability to Asassin [guys if I have been 
misspelling, let me know.]: poison dart.  This would be an alternate 
to Poison Cloud.
